message.body: So embarrassing. I'm in front of Wegmans now trying to figure our what to do after Jack repeatedly hit me as I walked in the door
Say that's a three, put him on his car seat, tighten it, and wait for 5
Oh and it got worse. You must deal with him when you get home. I'm about to cry

I'm sorry honey. It's not right the way he treats you. If you swing by Gemino I will come outside and give him a talking to. I was going to suggest taking you and the boys to lunch in the office cafeteria, but if Jack is being bad, I don't want to reward
Well, I'm making good progress with the Mark stuff, report is done but with open items (follow up questions). Don't expect answers today.
In the car to get you
